sector-product-analysis.name: Sector-Specific Product Analysis
sector-product-analysis.description: Competitors discovered through LLM sector-specific prompts that identify specific products and companies likely implementing patented technology

parameters.method: Claude Opus LLM analysis with sector-specific prompts

sector-product-analysis.notes: Unlike patent-citation-based discovery, this method identifies companies via product implementation intelligence rather than patent portfolio overlap

notes.patternMatching: Patterns are matched case-insensitively against assignee names
notes.excludePatterns: These patterns identify Broadcom portfolio entities (including acquisitions: VMware 2023, Symantec Enterprise 2019, CA Technologies 2018, Brocade 2017, LSI 2014) to exclude from competitor analysis
notes.enabled: Set category 'enabled' to false to exclude from analysis
notes.discoveryStrategies: Each competitor tracks which strategy surfaced them - supports multiple strategies per competitor

strategyTypes.manual: Manually added based on industry knowledge
strategyTypes.term-extraction: Discovered through ElasticSearch term extraction on specific patent subset
